components.label: Cause
components.description: Explain the reasons for your absence (create different requests for different causes)

components.text: Your manager will receive your absence requests and will be able to accept or deny them.

components.mapper: =source.map(managee => $collab.getSharedArray(managee.email, 'absence-requests').map(r => Object.assign(r, {email: managee.email}))).filter(r => r).reduce((a, v) => { a.push(...v); return a;},[]).filter(request => request.status !== 'new' && request.status !== undefined)

components.text: You have no absence requests from your managees.

components.mapper: =source.map(managee => $collab.getSharedArray(managee.email, 'absence-requests').map(r => Object.assign(r, {email: managee.email}))).filter(r => r).reduce((a, v) => { a.push(...v); return a;},[]).filter(request => request.status === 'submitted' || request.status === 'accepted')

components.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: auto auto auto auto auto auto auto;
